org.mapdb

Interface CC


  • public interface CC
    Compiler Configuration. Static final booleans to enable/disable features you want. Compiler and dead code elimination will take care of removing unwanted features from bytecode.
    Author:
    Jan Kotek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ASSERT
      Compile with assertions.
      static boolean BB_CHECK_AVAILABLE_SIZE 
      static boolean BB_LOG_WRITES
      Log all binary writes into log.
      static boolean FULL_TEST
      MapDB has some long running acceptance tests.
      static boolean LOG_LOCKS 
      static int MAX_BTREE_INLINE_VALUE_SIZE
      Values in BTreeMap are stored as part of nodes.
      static boolean PARANOID
      Compile with more assertions, this may slow down JDBM significantly
      static short STORE_FORMAT_VERSION 
      static boolean TRACE
      Compile with trace logging statements (Logger.debug and Logger.trace)

    • Field Detail

      • ASSERT

        static final boolean ASSERT
        Compile with assertions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARANOID

        static final boolean PARANOID
        Compile with more assertions, this may slow down JDBM significantly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRACE

        static final boolean TRACE
        Compile with trace logging statements (Logger.debug and Logger.trace)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FULL_TEST

        static final boolean FULL_TEST
        MapDB has some long running acceptance tests. For daily development it makes sense to skip those. This flag controls whatever all tests are run.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BB_LOG_WRITES

        static final boolean BB_LOG_WRITES
        Log all binary writes into log.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BB_CHECK_AVAILABLE_SIZE

        static final boolean BB_CHECK_AVAILABLE_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOG_LOCKS

        static final boolean LOG_LOCKS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STORE_FORMAT_VERSION

        static final short STORE_FORMAT_VERSION
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_BTREE_INLINE_VALUE_SIZE

        static final int MAX_BTREE_INLINE_VALUE_SIZE
        Values in BTreeMap are stored as part of nodes. However if serialized size is greater then this, value is placed as separate record and loaded on request.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
